document.docAuthor: Wiesner, Jürgen, Bandinelli, Aligi & Matalin, Andrey
document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

subSubSection.paragraph: Published data. NORTHEAST: Lao Cai ( Horn 1913: 365 ; 1924: 18 ).

New records.

Distribution. Vietnam ( Bac Giang , Bac Kan , Cao Bang , Ha Noi City, Hoa Binh , Lao Cai , Ninh Binh , Phu Tho , Thai Nguyen , Tuyen Quang , Vinh Phuc ), China ( Fujian , Guangdong , Guangxi , Hainan , Hong Kong , Jiangsu, Shandong, Shanghai, Sichuan, Yunnan), Laos ( Borikhamxay , Houaphanh , Luangnamtha , Luangprabang , Oudomxay , Phongsaly , Vientiane , Xiengkhuang ), Cambodia , Thailand ( Chiang Mai , Chiang Rai ), Myanmar ( Kachin , Sagaing , Shan ), Bangladesh , India ( Himachal Pradesh , Uttar Pradesh , Bihar , Western Bengal, Nagaland , Meghalaya , Assam , Tripura , Arunachal Pradesh , Sikkim ), Bhutan , Nepal .
Remarks. New provincial records for Bac Giang , Bak Kan, Cao Bang , Ha Noi City, Hoa Binh , Ninh Binh , Phu Tho , Thai Nguyen , Tuyen Quang and Vinh Phuc .
